reviewText: Her books are great! Highly recommended her books. Unfortunately the DVD is not a great choice. It only shows one project and is very simple. Really only good for very beginners. Not many crafting tricks are shared and when she using the glass cutter, it's hard to see what's going on.
What an awesome dvd! Very useful information! Laura Beth is so talented and makes it easy to learn from both her dvd and her books! Highly recommend!
Instructions were clear and easily understood. Materials and tools were well explained and demonstrated.
Great DVD.  Easy to follow instructions without music covering up the instructor's voice.  Assembling all the supplies right now and it should be fun. to create these pendants.
